languages.text: {n}Это зенитное орудие, безусловно, построено давно, много раньше начала колонизации этого мира. Неудивительно, что мятежники едва могли им управлять — протоколы современного вооружения непонятны {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} столь древней конструкции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Это орудие, безусловно, построено давно, много раньше начала колонизации этого мира. Неудивительно, что мятежники едва могли им управлять — протоколы современного вооружения непонятны {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} археотеха.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Это зенитное орудие, безусловно, построено давно, много раньше начала колонизации этого мира. Неудивительно, что мятежники едва могли им управлять — протоколы современного вооружения непонятны {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинным духам{/g} столь древней конструкции.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cannon was certainly constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such ancient make.{/n}

Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such ancient make.{/n}

Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible by the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient make.{/n}

Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible by the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient make.{/n}

Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

{n}The cannon certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Flugabwehrbatterie wurde ganz offensichtlich vor langer Zeit gebaut ... lange bevor die Kolonialisierung dieser Welt begann. Es ist kein Wunder, dass die Aufständischen sie kaum bedienen konnten. Moderne Waffenprotokolle sind für die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} einer so alten Konstruktion nicht zu verstehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Kanone wurde ganz offensichtlich vor langer Zeit gebaut — lange bevor die Kolonialisierung dieser Welt begann. Es ist kein Wunder, dass die Aufständischen sie kaum bedienen konnten. Moderne Waffenprotokolle sind für die {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} eines solch uralten Geräts nicht zu verstehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La batterie antiaérienne a sûrement été construite il y a longtemps, bien avant le début de la colonisation de ce monde. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les insurgés aient eu toutes les peines à s'en servir. Les protocoles des armes modernes sont incompréhensibles pour les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} de fabrication aussi ancienne.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le canon a sûrement été construit il y a longtemps, bien avant le début de la colonisation de ce monde. Il n'est donc pas surprenant que les insurgés aient eu toutes les peines à s'en servir. Les protocoles des armes modernes sont incompréhensibles pour les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g} de fabrication aussi ancienne.{/n}

languages.text: {n}很显然，这门防空炮是很久以前建造的，甚至早在这个世界殖民之前就造好了。难怪这些叛乱分子没办法很好地操作这门大炮，如此古老的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}根本无法理解现代军事指令。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}很显然，这门防空炮是很久以前建造的，甚至早在这个世界殖民之前就造好了。难怪这些叛乱分子没办法很好地操作这门大炮，如此古老的{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}根本无法理解现代军事指令。{/n}

languages.text: {n}その対空砲は昔に製造されたものであり、この世界の植民地化が始まるはるか前のものであった。反乱軍がそれをほとんど操作できなかったことは、特に驚くべきことではない。現代の武器プロトコルは、このような古代に作られた{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}には理解できないものである。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}その大砲は昔に製造されたものであり、この世界の植民地化が始まるはるか前のものであった。反乱軍がそれをほとんど操作できなかったことは、特に驚くべきことではない。現代の武器プロトコルは、このような古代の{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}には理解できないものである。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sin duda, la batería antiaérea se construyó hace mucho tiempo, mucho antes de que comenzara la colonización de este mundo. No es de extrañar que los insurgentes apenas pudieran hacerla funcionar. Los protocolos de armas modernos son incomprensibles para los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} tan antiguos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sin duda, el cañón se construyó hace mucho tiempo, mucho antes de que comenzara la colonización de este mundo. No es de extrañar que los insurgentes no pudieran hacerlo funcionar. Los protocolos de armas modernos son incomprensibles para los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g} de tan antigua creación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Havasavar bataryası; hiç şüphesiz uzun zaman evvel, bu dünyanın kolonileştirilmesi başlamadan çok önce inşa edilmiş. Asilerin onu zar zor çalıştırabilmesi şaşırtıcı değil. Modern silah protokolleri, böylesine kadim bir tertibatın {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g} ile anlaşamaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The anti-aircraft battery certainly was constructed a long time ago — long before the colonisation of this world began. It comes as no surprise that the insurgents were barely able to operate it. Modern arms protocols are incomprehensible to the {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g} of such an ancient construction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Havasavar bataryası; hiç şüphesiz uzun zaman evvel, bu dünyanın kolonileştirilmesi başlamadan çok önce inşa edilmiş. Asilerin onu zar zor çalıştırabilmesi şaşırtıcı değil. Modern silah protokolleri, böylesine kadim bir tertibatın {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g} ile anlaşamaz.{/n}
